section.SSBody:
• Team 8 - Paly Robotics
  • Team 100 - Woodside/Carlmont/Sequoia Robotics
  • Team 114 - Los Altos HS Robotics - Eagle Strike Robotics
  • Team 115 - Monta Vista Robotics - MVRT
  • Team 199 - Carlmont Robotics
  • Team 254 - Bellarmine Robotics - The Cheesy Poofs
  • Team 604 - Leland Robotics - Quixilver
  • Team 701 - Vanden Robotics - The RoboVikes
  • Team 840 - Aragon Robotics - ART
  • Team 846 - Lynbrook Robotics - Funky Monkeys
  • Team 971 - Mountain View - Spartan Robotics
  • Team 1700 - Castilleja Robotics - Gatorbotics
  • Team 1868 - The Space Cookies
  • Team 6036 - Peninsula Robotics

• AndyMark - Controls electronics
  • BaneBots, LLC - Motors, gearboxes, wheels
  • IFI Robotics - Victor Speed Controllers, robot controllers, wheels, gears
  • VEX Robotics - Solenoid valves, bearings, planetary gear boxes, wheels

• Alan Steel & Supply Co. - Sheet metal and aluminum boxbeam
  • Bimba - Pneumatics components
  • Coast Aluminum - Aluminum, boxbeam, rod stock and sheets
  • Home Depot - Wood, paintbrushes, paint, hinges, roofing
  • Joann Fabrics - Bumper cloth
  • Madco - Argon for welding
  • MSC - End mills, bits, shop repair supplies
  • McMaster-Carr - Springs, fasteners, pneumatic valves and fittings, machining lubricant, bandsaws
  • TAP Plastics - Plastic stock, acrylic glue
  • USA Bearings + Belts - Ball bearings + belts (surprise!)

• Getting Started with Java for FRC (pdf) - Essential reading for understanding Java for the cRIO
  • WPILibJ AP - API for the WPI Robotics library used for FRC
  • WPI FIRST Java Resource Center - Wiki, updates, and news for WPILibJ and Java for FRC
  • grtframework - GoogleCode project page
  • grt192 - GoogleCode project page
  • Electrical What?! - Image based lookup for schematic symbols
  • Sparkfun Electronics - Electronic, sensors, kits, tutorials
  • Jameco Electronics - Electronics (esp. bulk); see also Digi-Key
  • Digi-Key Corp - Electronics (esp. bulk); see also Jameco

• Whitney Tool Speed and Feed Calculator - Speed and Feed Rates for milling, lathing, drilling
  • Gear Theory From Boston Gear - Information on various gears (spur, helical, miter/bevel, worm gears) with general formulas for torque, pitch diameter, and velocity.
  • SDP-SI - Gears, timing belts, etc.
  • USA Bearings - Bearings

• FIRST CAD Library - An excellent source of CADs of Kit of Parts materials.
  • Autodesk FIRST Education Community - source for software, training, and help
  • Team 1323 CAD library - CADs of FIRST parts
  • PTC Creo FIRST CADs - Field and KoP CADs

• Guide to tinkering by HomeAdvisor - Collection of fun tinkering projects--suggested by Abigail Lynwood
  • Instructables - DIY guides

• Mapcon Robotics Guide - An accessible and thorough resource for learning about Robotics--suggested by Ms. Zimri and her Junior Scouts.
  • Electrical Education: Science Lessons and Activities - A thorough explanation of electricity with various projects involving electronics--suggested by Tom Coner.
